benchmark_details.name: OpenEval
benchmark_details.overview: OpenEval is an evaluation testbed that benchmarks Chinese LLMs across capability, alignment, and safety, addressing the gaps overlooked by existing benchmarks focused primarily on capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation platform for Chinese LLMs, covering capability, alignment, and safety assessments.

data.source: 25 benchmark datasets created specifically for evaluating Chinese LLMs.
data.annotation: Datasets compiled from various sources and manually curated.

methodology.calculation: Each benchmark employs specific metrics suited to their tasks, measuring LLM performance accordingly.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate better alignment with human values and performance on various NLP tasks.
methodology.validation: Phased public evaluation and benchmark update strategy implemented.
